GKS Logistics in Ivory Coast

Strategic Expansion to Serve West Africa

Request a Quote Discover Our Activities in Abidjan

Our Presence in Abidjan

In January 2025, GKS Logistics officially expanded its operations to Ivory Coast, marking an important milestone in our regional growth strategy. Our new base in Abidjan allows us to better serve our clients by offering comprehensive logistics solutions tailored to the dynamic Ivorian market.

Port Autonome d'Abidjan

Why Ivory Coast?

Ivory Coast represents a strategic hub in West Africa with the Autonomous Port of Abidjan, one of the most important in the region. Our local presence allows us to offer shorter delivery times and personalized service to our Ivorian and regional clients.
